mapper.select: select count(1) from t_match where score_result = 'end'

select t1.* from t_match t1 , ( select * from t_match where id=#{matchId} ) t2 where t1.home_team=t2.home_team and t1.leagueName=t2.leagueName and t1.season_id=t2.season_id and t1.score_result='end' ORDER BY (t1.roundName+0) asc limit 0,30

select t1.* from t_match t1 , ( select * from t_match where id=#{matchId} ) t2 where t1.away_team=t2.away_team and t1.leagueName=t2.leagueName and t1.season_id=t2.season_id and t1.score_result='end' ORDER BY (t1.roundName+0) asc limit 0,30
